Extract CCAN membership from links for a given GRanges object

Source: R/annotate_re_genes.R
get_ccan.Rd

Extract CCAN membership from links for a given GRanges object

Usage

get_ccan(links, gr, name_column = "region", split = c("ccan", "name"))

Arguments

links

GInteractions with CCAN1 and CCAN2 metadata columns

gr

GRanges to query

name_column

Character, metadata column in gr to use as identifier (default "region")

split

Character, "ccan" returns names per CCAN, "name" returns CCANs per name

Value

Named list split by CCAN or name as requested

On this page
